text: Château-Arnoux-Saint-Auban is a commune of 5,270 people (2008). It is found in the region Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur in the Alpes-de-Haute-Provence department in the south of France. == Education == A campus of the École nationale de l'aviation civile is located in the communeEnac / SEFA : La fusion opérationnelle pour le 1er janvier 2011.Vie des campus == Transports == * Château-Arnoux-Saint-Auban Airport == References == Category:Communes in Alpes-de-Haute-Provence
title: Château-Arnoux-Saint-Auban
